title: Heritage Burgundy Château Escape with Daily Breakfast & Premium Wine Tasting
description:
Explore the French region of Burgundy, famed the world over for its wines, at Hôtel Golf Château de Chailly, a 16-century castle set amid lush green hills in manicured surrounds. Leave the hustle and bustle behind and soak up the serenity of this picturesque part of the world with a stay at this three-wing castle with 45 bedrooms and suites and eight self-catering apartments.

Days are spent exploring the sprawling grounds and nearby vineyards, sampling gourmet local produce, or taking in the historic landscapes. Onsite you'll find a swimming pool, jacuzzi, sauna, steam room, fitness studio, and the lavish Vinèsime and Charme d’Orient SPA. A paradise for foodies, wine connoisseurs, and golf enthusiasts alike, Hôtel Golf Château de Chailly is also home to an 18-hole golf course - rated one of the Top 100 in Continental Europe by Golf World.

title: Stay in an Historic 16th Century Chateau with French Cooking Class, Award-Winning Golf & More
description: Stay in a renovated, three-wing castle in Burgundy and explore the region famous for its smooth, full-bodied red wines. Surround yourself with the gorgeous French countryside and views over the rolling hills and lush vineyards with a three, four or seven-night stay including daily buffet breakfast, your choice of resort activity - whether that’s a two-hour French cooking class for two with the hotel’s resident chef, a relaxing massage at the spa or a golf lesson at the hotel's award-winning 18-hole course together with a pro - a visit to the historic Chateau de Pommard with a wine tasting, a welcome aperitif and local snack for two and more.
location_description: L'Hôtel Golf Château de Chailly OLD

title: Heritage Burgundy Chateau Escape with 18-Hole Golf Course & Daily Breakfast
description:
Explore the French region of Burgundy, famed across the world for its wines, at Hôtel Golf Château de Chailly, a 16-century castle set amid lush green hills in manicured surrounds. Leave the hustle and bustle behind and soak up the serenity of this picturesque part of the world with a stay at this three-wing castle with 45 bedrooms and suites. Days are spent exploring the sprawling grounds and nearby vineyards, sampling gourmet local produce or taking in historic landscapes.

Onsite, you'll find a swimming pool, jacuzzi, sauna, steam room, fitness studio and the lavish Vinèsime and Charme d’Orient Spa. A paradise for foodies, wine connoisseurs, and golf enthusiasts alike, Hôtel Golf Château de Chailly is also home to an 18-hole golf course - rated one of the Top 10 in Northeast France by Fairway Magazine.

title: Fabulously French 16th-Century Chateau Stay
description: Stay in a beautifully restored three-wing castle in Burgundy and explore the region famous for its smooth, full-bodied red wines at the Château de Chailly-sur-Armançon. Surround yourself with the gorgeous French countryside and views over the rolling hills and lush vineyards, and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, your choice of resort activity - whether that’s a two-hour French cooking class for two with the hotel’s resident chef, a relaxing massage at the spa or a golf lesson at the hotel's award-winning, 18-hole course - a visit to the historic Château de Pommard with wine tasting, a welcome aperitif and local dish for two and more.

title: Five-Star Stay in France’s Top Wine Region with Daily Breakfast & Exclusive Wine Tasting
description: Discover the Medieval charms of Beaune, the walled city in the heart of France’s famed Burgundy wine region, staying at the gorgeous Hostellerie Le Cèdre. Spend your days exploring the glorious French countryside and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a welcome drink on arrival, a complimentary bottle of wine on arrival and an exclusive wine tasting at Château de Pommard, one of the region’s best wine producers.

title: Award-Winning French Wine Country Escape with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Wine Tasting Experience
description:
Experience the epitome of French elegance with a stay in this luxurious 19th century residence in Burgundy wine country. Found in a quaint village in the heart of the heavenly Côte-d'Or region, the hotel offers a serene escape amidst rolling vineyards and charming chateaus. Explore the area's rich history, savour world-class local wines, and indulge in the finest French cuisine at the onsite gourmet restaurant.

Take a leisurely stroll through the picturesque town of Puligny-Montrachet before returning to your sophisticated room, flooded with natural light and overlooking the French village. Boasting a MICHELIN Key award, this peaceful retreat will give you a taste of hospitality and laid-back living in the quintessential French way.
offer_address: 10 place du Pasquier de la Fontaine, Puligny-Montrachet 21190, France

title: 16th Century French Chateau Escape
description: Stay in a newly-renovated, three-wing castle in Burgundy and explore the region famous for its smooth, full-bodied red wines. Surround yourself with the gorgeous French countryside and views over the rolling hills and lush vineyards with a three, four or seven-night stay including daily buffet breakfast, welcome aperitif and local snack for two, two-hour cooking class for two with the hotel’s resident chef, wine tasting and a visit to Chateau de Pommard and more.

title: Historic 16th-Century Château Stay with French Vineyard Visit and Wine Tasting
description: Stay in a renovated, three-wing castle in Burgundy and explore the region famous for its smooth, full-bodied red wines. Surround yourself with the gorgeous French countryside and views over the rolling hills and lush vineyards with a three, four or seven-night stay including daily buffet breakfast, your choice of resort activity - whether that’s a two-hour French cooking class for two with the hotel’s resident chef, a relaxing massage at the spa or a golf lesson at the hotel's award-winning 18-hole course together with a pro - a visit to the historic Château de Pommard with a wine tasting, a welcome aperitif each and local specialty dish to share and more.

title: World-Renowned Relais & Châteaux Luxury in the Heart of Burgundy
description:
Explore the French region of Burgundy, famed the world over for its wines, at Domaine de Rymska - Relais & Châteaux, a beautifully refurbished and intimate residence set amid lush green hills in manicured surrounds. Leave the hustle and bustle behind and soak up the serenity of this picturesque part of the world with a stay at this five-star paradise of 10 rooms and suites.

Days are spent exploring the sprawling 80 hectares of ground and nearby vineyards, sampling gourmet local produce, or taking in the historic landscapes. Onsite you'll find a heated swimming pool, wine cellar, Porsche and electric bike rental (surcharges apply), majestic thoroughbred horses at the property’s stud farm, and the sophisticated La Table de Rymska - offering traditional cuisine created from the estate’s own livestock farm, vegetable garden and orchard.
offer_address: 1, rue du Château de, La Fosse, 71490 Saint-Jean-de-Trézy, France
